name: Sultan Warrior Revenge
description:
Command the supreme hordes and fight your way to the battle arena. Strike your enemies hard and leave them behind. Conquer the kingdom with a dominant army. The attack has started chaos between people of the kingdom. Sultan is a hero whose father was killed by his uncle to take over the kingdom. Sultan’s uncle has taken care of him since his birth, now it is time for the sultan to take revenge for his father. The clash on the defensive line is destroying the lands of nearby village and city. Lord of the throne has ordered Sultan Warrior to lead a powerful strike against the enemy along with his army troops and knight. Attack and win to get the ​glory. Enjoy this fun addictive game with true legend fighter. There has been an extreme clash between sultan warrior and rivals. Rule the kingdom in survival escape missions before they even try to kill you. Enter into the realistic breakout destruction world and win the war. Escape & fight in Sultan Warrior Revenge survival adventure.

Experience the most addictive action game Sultan Sultan Warrior Revenge. Be prepared for any situation. Fight to win the battle against the evil. The tale of his survival missions in the kingdom is truly epic. Survive the most dangerous challenges that come your way. Make strategy how to survive against all the strike and attack. Sultan Survival is an action combat game. This survival game is all about battle. Fight the war like a real hero legend. Spread terror with your dangerous attack, shooting, spy assassin and escape skills. The attack is stronger this time. Shoot and assassinate those who comes your way to become a grand fighter lord. Sneak away from a strike escape like a real hero and get back to rule the kingdom. Play hero chase against rivals squad wings awake. Sneak and kill to become ultimate killer legend warrior. Play Sultan Warrior Revenge to rule the kingdom.

Key Features:
- Interesting Game Play
- Delightful and Intuitive controls
- Stunning & High-Quality 3D Graphics
- Thrilling and Challenging Horse Riding Missions
- Amazing Urban City & Desert Environment
- Combat and Sword Fighting Missions
- War Battle Training Thrilling Mission
- Epic & High-Quality 3D Graphics
